description: Adds one or more key-value tags to an Amazon Rekognition collection, stream processor, or Custom Labels model. For more information, see Tagging AWS Resources. This operation requires permissions to perform the rekognition:TagResource action.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the model, collection, or stream processor that you want to assign the tags to.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The key-value tags to assign to the resource. (string) --- (string) ---
